text.autoconfig.steves_realistic_sleep.o: Send dawn message?
Send a message to all players on the actionbar at dawn.
Send dusk message?
Send a message to all players on the actionbar at dusk.
Dawn message
The message displayed to all players on the actionbar at dawn.
Dusk message
The message displayed to all players at dawn on the actionbar.
Send sleeping message?
Toggles the "players are sleeping through this night..." message on the actionbar.
Show time until dawn?
Displays the seconds until dawn on the actionbar.
Show time until dusk?
Displays the seconds until dusk on the actionbar.
Send not enough players sleeping message?
Toggles the amount of players who need to sleep to skip to dawn message on the actionbar.
Allow sleeping through the day?
Toggles daytime sleeping.
Sleep speed curve
The curve used to determine the speed multiplier of the night as time progresses.
Sleep speed multiplier
How many times faster the night should go.
Block entity tick speed multiplier
How many times faster block entities like furnaces should tick.
Chunk tick speed multiplier
How many times faster chunks should tick. Enable at your own risk, may cause huge TPS loss!
Raid tick speed multiplier
How many times faster raid timers should tick.
Fluid scheduled tick speed multiplier
How many times faster fluid movements should tick.
Thunder tick speed multiplier
How many times faster thunder should occur.
Ice and snow formation speed multiplier
How many times faster ice and snow should form.
Crop growth speed multiplier
How many times faster crops should grow.
Precipitation tick speed multiplier
How many times faster cauldrons should fill.
Block random tick speed multiplier
How many times faster blocks should random tick. Enable at your own risk, may cause huge TPS loss!
Fluid random tick speed multiplier
How many times faster fluids should random tick. Enable at your own risk, may cause huge TPS loss!
World renderer tick speed multiplier
How many times faster clouds should move, rain should fall, and thunder should strike.
Tick delay
Adds an amount of ticks delay to every tick, so time goes slower.
steves_realistic_sleep.text.not_enough_p: %d/%d players are currently sleeping. %d/%d players are required to sleep through the %s
